title: Fondue Night
description: Search our site for fondue recipes. Have a fun night dipping foods in cheese!

title: Theme night
description: Dress up like your favorite decade and have a themed dinner!

title: Bubble Bath
description: Draw a bubble bath for two!

title: Karaoke Night
description: Get a speaker and some music and take turns singing!

title: Marshmallow Roast
description: Grab some candles and roast some marshmellows because you don't know a person until you know how burnt they like their marshmellows!

title: Bake them Cookies
description: get pre-made dough or spend some extra time together whipping up some homemade cookie dough
